text.name: Christmas Nightmare
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 5) [Vibration] Count (max 10)
[EndSkill] If there are any targets in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, heal 10 SP
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +5 [Vibration] Count
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Christmas Nightmare
text.desc:
<style="highlight">If target has less than 0 SP, deal +1% damage for every SP value below 0 (max 45%)
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson. + 5) [Vibration] Count (max 10)
[EndSkill] If there are any targets in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, heal 10 SP
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +5 [Vibration] Count<style="highlight">
[OnSucceedAttack] If target isn't in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, inflict 5 [[Sinking]]
[OnSucceedAttack] If target isn't in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce the target's [Vibration] Count by 2
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1<style="highlight">

passiveList.name: A Gaze in the Shadows
passiveList.desc:
Allies gain +1 more [Vibration] Count from Skill or Coin effects (2 times per turn)
- If the ally's target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, gain +2 more instead
- Effect does not stack with E.G.O Gifts of an identical effect.
